Package ch.iserver.ace.net.core

The package ch.iserver.ace.net.core contains the core classes to the network layer and some default implementations for types defined in package ch.iserver.ace.net.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Discovery Interface for the service discovery, i.e.
DiscoveryCallback Discovery callback interface used by the discovery implementation to notify about events received from the network.
NetworkServiceExt This interface extends interface NetworkService for the network layer.
PortableDocumentExt Interface extension of PortableDocument for the network layer.
RemoteDocumentProxyExt Interface extension of RemoteDocumentProxy for the network layer.
RemoteUserProxyExt Interface extension of RemoteUserProxy for the network layer.
 

Class Summary
DiscoveryCallbackImpl Default implementation of interface DiscoveryCallback.
DiscoveryFactory Factory class for creating discovery implementations.
FragmentImpl Implementation of interface Fragment for the network layer.
InvitationProxyFactory Factory class for the creation of InvitationProxy objects.
InvitationProxyImpl Default implementation of interface InvitationProxy.
MutableUserDetails This class extends UserDetails for the network layer for more modification flexibility.
NetworkProperties Static class for the central access to network properties.
NetworkServiceImpl Default implementation for interface NetworkService.
PortableDocumentImpl Default implementation of interface PortableDocument for the network layer.
PublishedDocument Default implementation for interface DocumentServer.
RemoteDocumentProxyFactory Singleton factory class to create instances of type RemoteDocumentProxy.
RemoteDocumentProxyImpl Default implementation of type RemoteDocumentProxy.
RemoteUserProxyFactory Singleton factory class to create instances of type RemoteUserProxy.
RemoteUserProxyImpl Default implementation of type RemoteDocumentProxyExt.
 

Package ch.iserver.ace.net.core Description

The package ch.iserver.ace.net.core contains the core classes to the network layer and some default implementations for types defined in package ch.iserver.ace.net.
